### Function

```{r l}
# counts the number of odd integers in x
oddcount <- function(x) {
  k <- 0 #assign 0 to k
  for (n in x) {
    if (n %% 2 == 1) 
      k <- k + 1 ## %% is the modulo operator
  }
  return(k)
}

oddcount(c(1,3,5))

oddcount(c(1,2,3,5,7,9))

```

### Matrices
```{r m}
m <- matrix(1:6, nrow = 3, ncol = 3, byrow = TRUE)
print(m)
class(m)
str(m)
summary(m)
colnames(m) <- c("A", "B", "C")
rownames(m) <- c("D", "E", "F")
print(m)

(p <- rbind(c(1:4), c(5:8)))

(u <- cbind(c(1:4), c(5:8)))

(c <- u %*% c(1,1))

(u <- cbind(u, c))

(colnames(u) <- c("A", "B", "A+B"))
rownames(u) <- c("C", "D", "E", "F")
```
